# Example event for testing autocomplete and hover
namespace = test_events

test_events.0001 = {
	type = character_event
	title = test_events.0001.t
	desc = test_events.0001.desc
	theme = diplomacy

	trigger = {
		is_adult = yes
		any_vassal = {
			is_adult = yes
			opinion = {
				target = root
				value <= -50
			}
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		random_vassal = {
			limit = {
				is_adult = yes
				opinion = {
					target = root
					value <= -50
				}
			}
			save_scope_as = disgruntled_vassal
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = test_events.0001.a
		scope:disgruntled_vassal = {
			add_opinion = {
				target = root
				modifier = pleased_opinion
				opinion = 25
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		name = test_events.0001.b
		trigger_event = {
			id = test_events.0002
			days = 30
		}
	}
}
